attributes.action: ​Increase 'Expensive Car Supplement' threshold to £50,000 for Hybrid vehicles.
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the unfair "Luxury Tax" on family hybrids! 
​The £40k tax threshold is outdated. While EVs get a raise to £50k in April, hybrid drivers are being left behind. We’re calling on Parliament to raise the limit to £50k for all hybrids to keep green motoring affordable.
​Sign & share to tell the Govt to fix the Expensive Car Supplement! 
​
attributes.background: ​We call on the Government to raise the threshold for the Expensive Car Supplement (the "luxury car tax") from £40,000 to £50,000 for all petrol and diesel hybrid vehicles, matching the upcoming threshold increase for fully electric vehicles.
